body_html: Unfortunately this would lead to bloat as many things have different names, e.g., the smooth L1 loss in Torch is also known as the Huber loss, and there's several names for transposed convolutions. The recommendation would be to define those aliases in your own code if you prefer them.
body_text: Unfortunately this would lead to bloat as many things have different names, e.g., the smooth L1 loss in Torch is also known as the Huber loss, and there's several names for transposed convolutions. The recommendation would be to define those aliases in your own code if you prefer them.
body: Unfortunately this would lead to bloat as many things have different names, e.g., the smooth L1 loss in Torch is also known as the Huber loss, and there's several names for transposed convolutions. The recommendation would be to define those aliases in your own code if you prefer them.
